alert.note: Alert for Hancock; Johnson; Marion; Morgan; Shelby (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 17 at 6:58PM EDT until July 17 at 7:30PM EDT by NWS Indianapolis
info.description: The National Weather Service in Indianapolis has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Shelby County in central Indiana... Southwestern Hancock County in central Indiana... Northeastern Morgan County in central Indiana... Northern Johnson County in central Indiana... Southern Marion County in central Indiana... * Until 730 PM EDT. * At 657 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 9 miles southwest of Greenfield to near Greenwood to near Mooresville, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Southport, Boggstown, Fairland, Shelbyville and Franklin. This includes the following highways... Interstate 65 between mile markers 93 and 105. Interstate 74 between mile markers 97 and 111. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
